trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of instances of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> 类的实例的集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<operation>` element enclosed by the `<portType>` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation>类对应到 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL)`<operation>`括在元素`<portType>`元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 WSDL 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the properties and methods exposed by the `OperationCollection` class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用的属性和方法公开的`OperationCollection`类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> 添加到 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" /> 的结尾。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where the <paramref name="operation" /> parameter has been added.
trans-unit.target: 添加了 <paramref name="operation" /> 参数的位置的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the `Add` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 `Add` 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> for which to check collection membership.
trans-unit.target: 要为其检查集合成员资格的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> is a member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> 是否是 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" /> 的成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="operation" /> is a member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="operation" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" /> 的成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the `Contains` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 `Contains` 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> serving as the destination for the copy action.
trans-unit.target: 将作为复制操作目标的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to start placing the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: 将在该处开始放置所复制的集合的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" /> to a compatible one-dimensional array of type <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />, starting at the specified zero-based index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 将整个 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" /> 复制到兼容的、<see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> 类型的一维数组（从目标数组的指定的从零开始的索引处开始复制）。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the `CopyTo` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 `CopyTo` 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> for which to search in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中搜索的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />，并返回集合中第一个匹配项的索引（从零开始）。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 32 位带符号整数。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the `IndexOf` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 `IndexOf` 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the <c>operation</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，在该处插入 <c>operation</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" /> at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> 添加到 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" /> 中指定的从零开始的索引处。

trans-unit.source: If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在集合中的项的数目等于集合的容量，则容量被加倍通过自动重新分配在内部数组，才能插入新元素。

trans-unit.source: If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `operation` parameter is added to the end of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`参数等于<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>、`operation`参数添加到末尾<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: 插入点之后的元素将下移以容纳新元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the `Insert` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 `Insert` 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> whose value is modified or returned.
trans-unit.target: 其值被修改或返回的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> 的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位于指定的从零开始的索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Operation" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Operation" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the zero-based index to retrieve a member of the `OperationCollection`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用的从零开始的索引，以检索属于`OperationCollection`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从该集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> 中移除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationCollection" /> 的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The elements that follow the removed <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: 跟在移除的元素<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation>将上移以占据空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the `Remove` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 `Remove` 方法的用法。
